segments.text: I see the water gushing out of the sink, what a wasteful mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, letting it flood the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddleâ€”gross, she'll track it everywhere now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, sneaking cookies like little thieves in broad daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that stool, probably getting crumbs all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks greedy, hand out for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked; that's going to warp the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this whole setup is sloppy and irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the dish towel seems dingy wrapped around the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is neat, but inside it's a pigsty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone should clean this up before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so unnecessarily chaotic and unclean.
segments.speaker: PAR
